response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product holds immense value to us, reflecting years of innovation and dedication. We are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000, believing that this exceptional value proposition aligns closely with its true worth of $1,200,000. We understand that such a significant investment requires careful consideration, and we are confident that this offer presents an unparalleled chance to own a piece of excellence. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service to ensure your complete satisfaction. We look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
